text:
I still remember—
that brusque Nico, desperately
trying to protect something important.

And,
from Enoshiman at that time,
I felt the same resolve.

It must be...
To people who have something to protect at the cost of their lives,
that kind of resolve would show when the time comes.

I know.
The helpless feelings of those left behind.

Endless regret and a deep,
soul-crushing despair.
But—

At that time,
I was "not alone".
There "were" people who encouraged me.

It was precisely because there were people who supported me
that I was able to stand up.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
...But,
where is Enoshiman?

name: Island Kid
text:
When we call him,
he usually comes right away...

What about those children?
Even with Enoshiman gone,
aren't they fighting against anxiety?

If so,
what I can do now is—

[Player] and the others
skillfully repelled the monsters
attacking Enoshima Village.

And the heroes gathered around Saotome,
discussing their next steps.

name: Saotome
text:
Thanks to everyone,
we somehow managed to defeat the monsters.
Thank you very much, truly...!

At Saotome's words of gratitude,
the heroes gathered there nodded.

name: Saotome
text:
But, we can't let our guard down yet.
We have no idea when the monsters
will appear next.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
...Time is one thing, but
where they appear is also a problem, isn't it?

name: Astar
text:
Aside from beaches or open fields,
fighting in the village is bound to be tough.

options.text: It's hard to fight in narrow spaces.
But we can't just stay on the beach either...

name: Saotome
text:
Everyone is right.
To prevent further damage,
we must prepare for the monsters.

name: Saotome
text:
But, that's not all we have on our hands right now.
I couldn't bring myself to say it this morning,
but I've been keeping quiet about something—

dialogue_after_selection.text: Hearing [Player]'s words, Saotome nodded deeply.

name: Saotome
text:
...Actually, since the day the monsters attacked,
no one has seen Shiratori-kun.

name: Saotome
text:
He's a kind person. Perhaps,
he protected someone and was taken by a monster...
But I still don't want to give up.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Saotome-san...
...........

name: Astar
text:
...We need to
help search for Shiratori, right?

Saotome hesitated for a moment before replying.
However, he looked back at Astar's gaze
with a serious face and nodded.

name: Saotome
text:
...I want to find him,
and restore the daily life of Enoshima
that was destroyed by the monsters.

name: Saotome
text:
Also, I want to safely send off all the tourists
who came to visit Enoshima
outside the island.

name: Saotome
text:
Even if EnoRail, our only means of transportation,
is restored, it's meaningless if everyone is attacked by monsters
before they can even reach the station.

name: Saotome
text:
So everyone...
I'm sorry to keep asking, but
would you please cooperate with me?

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
You're being too formal, Saotome-san!
That's a given, isn't it!?

name: Astar
text:
Of course.
Things that the monsters took away from us,
we must take back with our own hands.

name: Astar
text:
...That would also be for the sake
of the children of Enoshima, wouldn't it?

options.text: We can't have any more sacrifices.

name: Kiloc
text:
Hey, Saotome-san.
You have a plan, don't you?
...I can tell by your eyes.

name: Kiloc
text:
For me personally,
I'd like to hear your
thoughts first.

name: Joezen
text:
That's right. If it's Saotome-san,
who knows everything about Enoshima,
he might be able to break through this situation.

Receiving expectant gazes from the parent and child
who oversee the Estevolta (one city fleet),
Saotome nodded strongly.

name: Saotome
text:
It might not be a great idea, but
I thought we could use that.

Saotome, who said that,
pointed to the observatory visible deep within the village.

The building that was a remnant of the observation base
that [Player] and the others had visited before.

name: Alend
text:
—I see. I understand your idea.
Saotome, you seem to have thoroughly researched
my abilities as a hero.

name: Alend
text:
Indeed, if I have my Parallel Weapon,
I might be able to help you
with what you want to do.

name: Senthak
text:
Right!
If Alend-kun's ability and
that equipment are combined!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—That's good.
It really helps that you're quick to understand.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Um...
Saotome-san, Alend-san!?
Please elaborate further!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ehehe!
I completely understood it!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Unless you explain in more detail, I won't understand anything...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...[Player].
Your eyes are darting around, so are you really understanding...?

name: Alend
text:
Sorry, I wasn't clear enough.
In short, if we combine my Parallel Weapon and
the observation base—

name: Saotome
text:
—We might be able to preempt the monsters.
As for the specific method,
could you explain it once we reach the observatory?

Following Saotome's plan,
the heroes began to act.

[Player] and the others led the people of Enoshima Village
out of the village and escorted them
to the observatory.

name: Island Kid
text:
Mom...!
What's going to happen to us...?

name: Islander
text:
Don't worry, it'll be alright.
Just like they've helped us before,
the heroes will surely protect us this time too.

name: Island Kid
text:
R-Right.
We'll surely be saved, right?
But...

name: Island Kid
text:
Who will help
Enoshiman,
who's gone missing...?

While the islanders watched anxiously,
[Player] and the others were rechecking
the observatory's structure and equipment.

name: Saotome
text:
...Oh, there it is!
The paper has completely discolored, but
I found the equipment manual booklet!

name: Saotome
text:
Using this place, which has the best view in Enoshima,
as an observation base once again—that's
my plan to "preempt the monsters".

name: Saotome
text:
And... there's one more
purpose for using this place.

name: Saotome
text:
The other reason is that it will be
a stepping stone for resuming EnoRail's operation.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Um...
Resuming EnoRail's operation...?

name: Saotome
text:
Yes. I've also been in contact with the operating company
that partners with Enoshima Village, but
EnoRail hasn't moved at all since yesterday.

name: Saotome
text:
Tourist evacuation isn't progressing either, and
if this situation continues for long,
we'll have to worry about supplies.

name: Astar
text:
...It can't be helped.
It would be reckless to run the train
if the rail conditions are left unchecked.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
That's right...
If the rails were eaten by monsters,
it would derail halfway, wouldn't it?

name: Saotome
text:
That's where this observation base comes in!
If we can check the rail conditions from here,
we can get EnoRail back on its tracks!

name: Saotome
text:
If we can do that,
it will also be a way to evacuate tourists,
and a base for supplying materials.

options.text: If EnoRail moves, the situation might change!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
I see!
To safely send off the tourists,
and to stay in Enoshima and fight monsters...

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Resuming EnoRail's operation is
a very important factor, isn't it?

name: Astar
text:
This facility was originally meant to
observe South Kanto, which is across the sea.

name: Astar
text:
In that case, indeed,
checking EnoRail's condition
should be easy.

name: Saotome
text:
That's right, Astar-kun.
If we can just get the observation base working again,
the situation should improve!

options.text: Then we might be able to do it!
By fully utilizing his knowledge of Enoshima,
This is Saotome's own way of fighting...!

name: Saotome
text:
Wahahaha!
My love for Enoshima
will be of some use, right!

name: Saotome
text:
Just as I thought, the equipment manual
was left behind, and we have data for the base's blueprints.
All that's left is—

While Saotome was explaining,
Alend looked through the remaining blueprints and
the observation equipment manual.

name: Alend
text:
Operating communication equipment is outside my expertise,
but with this much documentation,
I think I can manage.

name: Alend
text:
Reactivating and adjusting the equipment,
and building anything that's irreparable or missing
with my Parallel Weapon—

name: Alend
text:
If I do that, we should be able to grasp the situation
of the entire island from this location.

name: Alend
text:
Of course, this is on the premise that
those who are good with machines will help...
Is there anyone who can lend me a hand?

name: Alend
text:
—Alright. Let's get to work
immediately for the trial run.
[Player], I'm counting on your observation.

Following Alend's instructions, the heroes
checked and adjusted the equipment
left in the Enoshima Observatory.

name: Senthak
text:
We're good here, Alend-kun!
It's a bit worn out, but
the equipment is still alive and well!

name: Astar
text:
To think the skills I learned for repairing my "sleigh"
would be put to use in this way.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Even so... the equipment here,
isn't it quite clean considering
it hasn't been used for a while?

name: Saotome
text:
Ah, I thought I could at least make sure it's clean,
so I regularly maintained it.
...Me and Shiratori-kun, we split the work between ourselves.

name: Island Kid
text:
Everyone, are you ready?
Now's the time—

While each person made adjustments,
Alend used his Parallel Weapon to compensate
for the damaged equipment.

name: Alend
text:
—It's going according to plan.
Connection to all communication devices established,
Enoshima Observation Base reactivation, complete.

On the observation base's full-perimeter monitor,
various observation data was displayed,
from the station to the beach, and inside the village.

name: Alend
text:
With this, we can quickly detect monster activity
without burdening the "Observer"!

name: Alend
text:
We should be able to improve the situation
where we're caught off guard and forced
into a tough fight like before!

As Alend said that,
he had a little sweat on his brow.

dialogue_after_selection.text: Noticing [Player]'s puzzled gaze, Alend replied that it was no problem.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
My Parallel Weapon has poor fuel efficiency.
I'm aware of this much burden.
It's nothing for you to worry about.

options.text: You're pushing yourself pretty hard, aren't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah... that's right.
You knew about my Parallel Weapon's poor fuel efficiency.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But, compared to the burden I placed on you back then, this is nothing.
Leave it to me, for I'll sure to deliver results.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
H-Hey! [Player]!
I appreciate your concern, but please step back for now.
My concentration is... breaking!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Alend
dialogue_after_selection.text:
My Parallel Weapon has poor fuel efficiency.
I want to increase efficiency even by the littlest bit, so let me concentrate on control.

text:
Next to the smiling Alend,
Senthak, who had been staring at the monitor,
let out a loud voice.

name: Senthak
text:
—Bingo, Alend-kun!
There's a reaction in the beach area!
This might be a monster already!

Hearing Senthak's loud voice,
the heroes gathered.

name: Kiloc
text:
They got a hit already!
Now that we know they're coming,
this isn't the time to sit idly by!

name: Joezen
text:
Now is the time for a counterattack!
Let's preemptively defeat them
before they get close to the observatory!

name: Saotome
text:
I agree with the counterattack, but
we can't leave this observatory
unprotected!

name: Saotome
text:
I, Astar-kun, Yohack-kun, and
[Player]-kun will head out for the interception!

name: Astar
text:
If it's a battle while moving around the island,
we, who have spent a long time in Enoshima,
would be more suitable.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
That's right!
I have Saotome-san's tourist map
completely memorized!

name: Saotome
text:
Alend-kun, I'm counting
on your observation here!

name: Saotome
text:
Kiloc-kun and the others,
please strengthen the observatory's defenses
in case of an emergency!

name: Alend
text:
...Understood. I'll request the remote operator
to take over the observation.
[Player], please head towards the beach.

name: Senthak
text:
We'll support Alend-kun
and strengthen the observatory's defenses!

name: Kiloc
text:
In terms of Parallel Weapon abilities,
our specialty is defense.
Leave this to us!

name: Joezen
text:
[Player]-san!
Please don't overexert yourself!

The group, sent off by the heroes,
ran down the observatory's slope
and rushed to Enoshima Beach.

However, contrary to expectations,
there were no monsters on the beach they arrived at.

options.text: There are signs of them, but...

text:
Even with sharpened senses,
they couldn't pinpoint the exact location of the monsters.

Astar spoke to [Player],
who was in such a state.

name: Astar
text:
[Player].
Take a look at that.

Where Astar pointed,
the photo spot installed on the beach
had turned into a miserable wreck.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
How terrible...
To think the beach we played on together
would become like this...

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
[Player]-san.
Is this also the work of monsters?

options.text: I can't say for sure yet...

name: Astar
text:
You can sense their presence, can't you?
If this is the work of monsters,
they might be lurking nearby.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
That's right...
Let's not let our guard down.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text: —Ah!

Yohack, who had been looking around,
let out a surprised cry and pointed to the beach.

Where Yohack pointed,
several children were gathered
in the forest near the beach.

name: Saotome
text:
Yuto!
And the village children too!
What are they doing here...!?

[Player] and the others rushed to the children,
while remaining vigilant of their surroundings.

name: Saotome
text:
You all!
What are you doing here!?

name: Saotome
text:
I told you not to leave the observatory
that the heroes are protecting!

name: Saotome
text:
Enoshima is not safe right now.
If you are still around here,
you'll be attacked by monsters!

Scolded by the usually cheerful Saotome,
the children were surprised.
One of them spoke calmly.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
I called everyone.
Sorry, Dad.
For doing something without your permission...

name: Saotome
text:
...Hey, Yuto.
If you do something like this without consulting me,
everyone will be troubled.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
We really wanted
to help Enoshiman...

name: Island Kid
text:
So, we've been searching around the island,
including this photo spot.

Saotome, hearing the children's words,
let out a strained voice.

name: Saotome
text:
...I see.
I understand your anxiety,
when Enoshiman is nowhere to be found.

name: Saotome
text:
But what will you do if you're attacked by monsters
doing something like that?

name: Saotome
text:
You, who have always cheered for Enoshiman,
must know how scary monsters are...

name: Saotome's Son
text: —That's why!

name: Saotome's Son
text:
We've always cheered for Enoshiman,
and Enoshiman has always protected us!

name: Saotome's Son
text:
But, if Enoshiman isn't coming
like he usually does—

name: Saotome's Son
text:
—That means Enoshiman is in trouble, right?
Since he's always protected us,
this time we have to help him...!

name: Saotome
text:
Yuto, and everyone...
I see, for Enoshiman's sake...

name: Saotome
text:
(I, who did "something similar",
might not have the right to scold them.
However, even so—)

Saotome's voice trembled,
and he gently stroked the children's heads.

Then,
he spoke in a persuasive tone,
wanting to calm them down.

name: Saotome
text:
I understand everyone's feelings very well.
You came for Enoshiman, didn't you?

name: Saotome
text:
I feel the same way.
I, of course,
want to help Enoshiman too.

name: Saotome
text:
So, leave helping Enoshiman to us,
and let's return to the observatory
together for now.

name: Saotome
text:
...Everyone, do you understand
what this old man is saying?

name: Island Kid
text:
Sniffle.
O-Okay.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
...Yes.
Dad, I'll do as you say.
I'm sorry for causing you trouble...

The moment Saotome reached out to the children,
who apologized with tears in their eyes—

An indescribably unpleasant chill ran
down [Player]'s spine.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Understood!
I won't let anyone lay a hand on them!

name: Saotome
text:
Yohack-kun and the others,
concentrate on the battle!
I'll protect the children!

name: Monster
text: Guoooooh!

A moment after [Player]'s words,
monsters appeared from the shoreline.

Unlike when Enoshiman was around,
the children couldn't even scream at the monsters' appearance,
their faces pale, their bodies stiff—

Seeing the children's state,
Astar's heart ached and he clenched his fist.

name: Astar
text:
[Player]...
I want to bring back the children's smiles.

name: Astar
text:
The children were happy with my surfing,
which I trained for to become "Santa".

name: Astar
text:
I never imagined I'd receive such
praise until I came here.
That's why, at that time...!

Astar, who had been gazing at the children,
muttered softly, making a decision for himself.
And, he clenched his fist tightly.

name: Astar
text:
...Even so, the children who smiled then,
are now crying on the same beach.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Astar-san...
You are...

name: Astar
text:
Enoshiman, even during his battles with monsters,
made sure the children could smile.

name: Astar
text:
I liked his policy of behaving brightly
while protecting the children.

The figure of a man who made various efforts
for the anxious children.

For Astar, it was a scene that overlapped
with "themselves" from a long time ago.

name: Astar
text:
—However,
Enoshiman is not here.

name: Astar
text:
If Enoshiman isn't here,
can we not bring a smile to the children...?
Can we not spare them the peace of mind?

name: Astar
text:
—No, that's not it.
Surely, even now,
there's something we can do.

name: Saotome
text:
...Astar-kun.
You, to that extent...

name: Saotome's Son
text:
Astar-san, you are
a hardworking Santa!

name: Island Kid
text:
...Sorry for saying you looked weird.
Both your Santa outfit and your surfing outfit
were incredibly cool!

name: Astar
text:
...[Player].
I want to bring back those bright smiles
to the children, just like that time.

name: Astar
text:
I want to be there for the children
who are fighting anxiety, this time.

name: Astar
text:
Just like you
did for me...!

As if reacting to Astar's words,
[Player]'s device emitted a red light.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
[Player]-san, Astar-san...!
This light, could it be...!

name: Astar
text:
...Ah.
It's the same color as Yohack's light.
If I also have that qualification...!

name: Astar
text:
[Player].
Could you lend me your power
one more time?

options.text: There's no need to say "one more time"!
I'll observe you countless times, Astar!

name: Astar
text:
...Thank you, [Player].
I knew you would say that.

name: Astar
text:
Watch me.
I will definitely bring back
smiles to the children!

name: Mobile Device
text:
—Connect to path?
To start operation,
tap "OK".

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text: Th-This form...!

[Player] observed Astar's strong wish,
and connected to the parallel universe.

—When the dazzling light subsided, there was
Astar, clad in a swimwear-style suit,
holding a paddle.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
O-Of course.
Having you observe me, I wouldn't dare show a disgraceful appearance...!

options.text: Whoa, your skin exposure is dazzling!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player], you scoundrel!
This is not the time for that!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No...
It's not that I dislike you watching me, but...

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Whoa!
Astar-san, you look so cool,
like a warrior of the sea!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
The Parallel Weapon you're holding
is for paddle surfing...!

name: Saotome
text:
Following Yohack-kun,
Astar-kun also has a new form!?

name: Saotome
text:
Are heroes able to change their appearance
depending on the situation!?

options.text: It's a case-by-case basis, I suppose...

name: Saotome
text:
I-I see... So that's how it is.
I've never seen such a hero before,
so I didn't know.

name: Saotome
text:
...Even so,
a swimsuit and a surfboard!
You're like a Santa from the tropics!

Hearing Saotome's words,
Astar remembered a distant memory.

name: Nico
text:
That's right.
If the day ever comes when our activities
extend to the Southern Hemisphere...

name: Nico
text:
We might need to pretend to be a summer Santa.
Well, that's still a long way off, though.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...At that time,
I never dreamed it would be
so far in the future.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
And before I knew it,
I had convinced myself that I could never
reach that point.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
I never thought it would come to fruition
in the Northern Hemisphere, in midsummer...
Fate is an interesting thing.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...[Player].
This is all thanks to you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...If so, my training wasn't in vain, was it?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...If so, my training wasn't in vain, was it?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Ah. If it's you, I can leave everything to you.

text:
The smiling Astar,
powerfully shouted at the monsters,
wielding his paddle-shaped Parallel Weapon.
His figure was as if—

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
From now on,
I will play the role of the "summer Santa",
who brings smiles to children!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
I will cut through the bad monsters
who scare children, along with the waves!
Now, let's go!

Astar threw the surfboard he was carrying
forward, then leaped onto it with momentum.

Controlling the waves with his exceptional sense of balance,
he sliced through the monsters with his paddle-shaped Parallel Weapon.

The monsters, their cores crushed,
disappeared as particles of light,
as the water splashed.

name: Island Kid
text:
Amazing!
It's sparkling like magic!

name: Island Kid
text:
Astar-oniichan,
you're incredibly cool...!

The children, forgetting their fear from earlier,
their eyes sparkling at Astar's superb technique.

And [Player] concentrated on observation,
sensing the arrival of new monsters.

options.text: Everyone, prepare for the next enemy!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Understood,
[Player]-san!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Astar-san was so cool
that I was completely captivated,
but I'll fight the best as I can too!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
I'll go to the front!
Yohack, I'm counting on your support!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Leave it to me!
I'll protect your back, Astar-san!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Let's go, [Player]!
To beyond the waves,
I shall deliver smiles!
Battle Start

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
[Player]!
We'll finish them with the next blow!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Understood, [Player]-san!
I'll open a breakthrough!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Astar-san!
I'm counting on your attack!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
"Unlock"!
Omnes Exitus!
How about this!?

Yohack straddled his jet ski.
He weaved through the monsters, creating complex waves
while skillfully toying with them.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
A good wave is coming.
I'll ride it...!

Astar predicted the wave's movement,
and drew a trajectory to slice the monsters in one swift motion.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
"Blessing"!
Sommer Lächeln!
This "Santa" shall cross the waves!

Astar swiftly sliced through the monsters,
who were disoriented by Yohack's movements,
with his paddle-shaped blade.

name: Monster
text: Guoooooh...!

Through the cooperation of the two heroes,
centered on [Player]'s command,
all the monsters returned to light.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's not my strength alone.
The Parallel Weapon you gave me is teaching me the waves' movements.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
In other words, it's... also thanks to you...
...That's how it is.

options.text: He's using the board like his own limbs!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's not my strength alone.
The Parallel Weapon you gave me is teaching me the waves' movements.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
In other words, it's... also thanks to you...
...That's how it is.

options.text: Yohack-san, your maneuvering is amazing too...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ehehe!
It seems I can use it this way too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: It was a spur-of-the-moment thing, so I'm glad it went well!

text:
The heroes, who quickly repelled the monsters
and returned to the beach, were surrounded
by cheering children.

name: Island Kid
text:
Astar-san, amazing!
No one in Enoshima
can ride waves that well!

name: Island Kid
text:
Yohack-kun was cool too~!
He avoided the monsters
and helped Astar-san!

Seeing the children's beaming smiles,
the heroes' cheeks naturally softened.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Ah, thank you.
I'm glad you're safe...

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Most of all,
I'm glad your smiles
have returned.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Ehehe!
It's all thanks to everyone's support!

Seeing the innocently smiling children,
Saotome gently approached.

name: Saotome
text:
Thanks to the heroes,
the monsters were safely defeated.
Now everyone, let's return to the observatory.

name: Saotome
text:
But before that,
there's something I'd like to say.
Don't wander outside on your own anymore.

name: Saotome
text:
This time, thanks to Astar-kun and the others,
we avoided a disaster, but...

name: Saotome
text:
It might not work out next time.
And you all don't want to trouble
Astar-kun and the others, do you?

name: Island Kid
text:
...Okay.
We won't do it again.

name: Saotome's Son
text:
...Yes.
Dad, I'll do as you say.
I'm sorry for causing you trouble...

Having said it, the children
bowed their heads to [Player] and the others.

[Player] and the others,
entrusted with Enoshiman's rescue by the children,
returned to the observatory at once to put them off there.

name: Joezen
text:
[Player]-san,
good work on defeating the
monsters and rescuing the children!

name: Kiloc
text:
Astar's board handling was splendid too!
That would surely surprise the surfers in Estevolta!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...I-Is that so?
If you say so,
then it wasn't bad, I suppose.

name: Senthak
text:
Yohack-kun's maneuvering was cool too!
It made my tension skyrocket!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Thank you!
Senthak-san and Joezen-kun, it's
thanks to you teaching me the tricks!

Alend spoke to [Player] and the others,
who were sharing the joy of overcoming obstacles.

name: Alend
text:
...Our observation here is also going smoothly.
We're checking EnoRail's guide path,
and no damage has been confirmed so far.

name: Alend
text:
If all safety checks are completed like this,
we should be able to run the train by tomorrow morning.

name: Senthak
text:
Monster activity, other than on the beach,
is calm for now!
It's like yesterday's momentum was all a lie!

options.text: The situation is starting to improve!

name: Saotome
text:
Wahahaha!
This is what they call a blessing in disguise.

name: Saotome
text:
If there's no monster activity,
I'd like [Player]-kun and the others
to rest a bit and—

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
—[Player]. There's something I want
to confirm before we get to resting.
Yohack, Saotome, please come too.

The group moved to the beach at Astar's suggestion,
and gathered in front of the ruined photo spot.

Astar pointed to
the shattered remains of the photo spot.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Now that I think about it, something is strange.
When we came here during the day, the children
recognized these ruins as the photo spot.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
If a monster had consumed it,
that wouldn't happen, would it?

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Th-That's certainly true, as Astar-san says!
A normal person wouldn't be able to remember
what was there!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
But if that's the case, then this photo spot...
wasn't eaten by a monster, but
destroyed by a person!?

name: Saotome
text:
Assuming it was a person's doing,
who would do such a thing?

name: Saotome
text:
At the very least, when everyone started evacuating to the observatory
under our guidance, there should have been
no problems!

name: Saotome
text:
In a place where monsters might appear,
to secretly destroy a concrete photo spot
in such a short time...

name: Saotome
text:
Who on earth
could do such a thing...?

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
There are, aren't there?
Us local heroes who can gain
power beyond that of ordinary people.

name: Saotome
text:
N-No way... No!
Don't joke around!

options.text: I don't want to believe it, but...

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...Given the situation,
he's the first one we should suspect.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
If that's really true,
why would Enoshiman-san
do such a thing...?

name: Saotome
text:
Yohack-kun is right!
Enoshiman has always protected
everyone on the island, you know?

name: Saotome
text:
So to do something like this,
even if the situation suggests it,
I can't possibly believe it!

name: Saotome
text:
If Enoshiman is alive,
and can move like before—

name: Saotome
text:
He should show his energetic self
as a local hero, in front of us,
without destroying anything...

name: Saotome
text:
Hey, [Player]-kun!
What do you think?
Could you give me your opinion?

At this time, [Player] remembered
the true identity of the suspected person,
and the promise they had made with him.

options.text: Before I speak my opinion, there's something I need to tell you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yohack (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Something you need to tell...?
[Player]-san, what on earth is it—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, I agree!
Besides, Enoshiman wouldn't have any reason to destroy the photo spot, would he?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Wait, [Player]—
Who is "he"?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text: Could it be that you know who Enoshiman is?

options.text: (Close your mouth tightly and remain silent)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Astar (Last Resort)
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...[Player].
Perhaps you're holding something that we don't know?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Please, [Player]-kun!
If you're silent, it must be very difficult to say, but—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Saotome
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If it's a matter related to this situation, could you please tell us?
I beg you!

text:
[Player] made up their mind and
opened their sealed lips.

options.text: Please keep this from anyone else.

text:
[Player] told Saotome, Yohack, and Astar
that Enoshiman's true identity was Shiratori.

name: Saotome
text:
Shiratori-kun is
Enoshiman...?

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Eh!?
What does that mean!?

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
[Player]...
Are you sure about that?

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...If so, why did you
keep silent until now?

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
It was your decision.
So surely, there must be a reason, but...

[Player] shared the content of their conversation
with Shiratori at the village office.

That information surprised the heroes,
but after the initial shock passed,
it was accepted with a little understanding.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
...Now that you mention it, indeed,
I've never seen Shiratori-san and
Enoshiman-san at the same time.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
Both are elusive, after all.
It's not entirely impossible... Is it?

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
In this situation, indeed,
I don't think [Player]
would be joking.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Besides, if Shiratori-san insisted so much
on "keeping his identity a secret"...

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
I understand why [Player]-san
couldn't speak.

As Astar and Yohack processed the information,
Saotome alone seemed unable to accept it.

name: Saotome
text:
No, that can't be true.
Shiratori-kun being Enoshiman,
that's absolutely impossible...!

name: Saotome
text:
Enoshiman has protected
this island for over 10 years.

name: Saotome
text:
But Shiratori-kun
moved to this island
five years ago.

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
...What do you mean?
That doesn't add up.

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Then who was Enoshiman,
who fought with us...?

Chapter 6:
Who is He?

—Without any warning,
his hometown was attacked by monsters.

Before his eyes, friends and family,
and familiar townscapes,
were swallowed by unknown abominations.

Abandoning everything,
he fled for his life—

—When he realized it,
he had drifted ashore on an unfamiliar beach.
His body ached terribly everywhere.
Ugh...

He was already at his physical limit.
He couldn't even stand up, let alone
move a single finger.

name: Monster
text: Gigigii—

And, a monster was right before him.
Just like it swallowed his hometown,
it approached him with its inorganic jaws wide open.

Inside the monster's gaping maw,
a sinister darkness spread,
looking like outer space.

He thought that if he was swallowed by this thing,
his existence would end meaninglessly—

name: Enoshiman
text:
—Hah-hah-hah!
Local hero Enoshiman!
I've arrived!

name: Enoshiman
text:
Take this!
Enoshiman Knuckle!

The next moment, a strangely cheerful voice was heard,
and a figure that appeared as swiftly as a gust of wind
blew away the monster.

The monster, struck by a powerful blow,
disappeared into the void as particles of light.

name: Enoshiman
text:
That was a close call,
but it seems I made it in time!
No need to worry anymore!

name: Enoshiman
text:
...You're badly injured.
Let's take you to the village clinic right away.
I promise you, you will be saved!

The man who introduced himself as Enoshiman
declared that, then proceeded to pick him up.

The warmth emanating from his palm
made him feel that he had been saved.

name: Enoshiman
text:
—Oh, I almost forgot.
Could you tell me your name?

My— My name is no longer
"Enoshiman".

As everyone was confused by the
sudden appearance of the mystery—

Breaking the silence,
[Player]'s device's
notification sound rang out.

name: Alend
text:
[Player]!
Sorry for the sudden notice, but
please head to Enoshima Station!

name: Senthak
text:
Just now, there was a reaction on the rails!
I don't know who it is, but
someone's trying to start EnoRail!

name: Senthak
text:
We haven't finished checking the rails yet!
If it derails somewhere,
the train will become fish food!

name: Alend
text:
So [Player]!
Hurry to Enoshima Station!
Before the worst happens!

options.text: I'll head to Enoshima Station right away!

name: Saotome
text:
Oh no...!
I have no idea what's going on, but
let's hurry to Enoshima Station, everyone!

name: Saotome
text:
I'll guide you on the shortest route!
Follow me!

name: Astar (Last Resort)
text:
—No, Saotome.
Even if we run now,
we won't make it in time!

name: Yohack (Last Resort)
text:
Let's use our Parallel Weapons!
[Player]-san!
Please observe us!
